```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, fig.dim =c(8, 4))
library(soar)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
plot_ps <- get_plot_totals(use_pre_switch = F)

treat_ps <- get_treatment_means(use_pre_switch = T) 
```

```{r}

ggplot(treat_ps, aes(censusdate, pb_e_ma, color = oplottype)) +
  geom_line()

pb_ratio <- treat_ps %>%
  filter(as.numeric(oera) > 1) %>%
  select(period, censusdate, oplottype, oera, pb_e_ma) %>% #use of 6mo moving average gets rid of 0s
  tidyr::pivot_wider(id_cols = c("period", "censusdate", "oera"), names_from = oplottype, values_from = pb_e_ma) %>%
  mutate(c_over_e = C / E)

ggplot(pb_ratio, aes(censusdate, c_over_e)) +
  geom_line()

```
